Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.name: A.I. Limiter
Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.description: A.I. Limiter are super advanced electronics that are used to control A.I.s and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

Desc_Snow_C.name: Actual Snow
Desc_Snow_C.description: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.name: Adaptive Control Unit
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.description: Project Part #5. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_AluminumPlate_C.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
Desc_AluminumPlate_C.description: Thin lightweight & highly durable sheet that is mainly used for products that need to be light or have high heat conduction.

Desc_AluminaSolution_C.name: Alumina Solution
Desc_AluminaSolution_C.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into pure Aluminum.

Desc_AluminumIngot_C.name: Aluminum Ingot
Desc_AluminumIngot_C.description: Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap. It is mostly used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

Desc_AluminumScrap_C.name: Aluminum Scrap
Desc_AluminumScrap_C.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.name: Automated Wiring
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.description: Project Part #3. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_Battery_C.name: Battery
Desc_Battery_C.description: Batteries store an electrical charge. They are primarily used as a power source.

BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.name: Beacon
BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable
Used to mark areas of interest. Displayed on your compass with the color and name you set for it.

Desc_GenericBiomass_C.name: Biomass
Desc_GenericBiomass_C.description: Primarily used as fuel. Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power. Biomass is much more energy efficient than raw biological matter.

Desc_Gunpowder_C.name: Black Powder
Desc_Gunpowder_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used in explosives and cartridges.

Desc_XmasBall2_C.name: Blue FICSMAS Ornament
Desc_XmasBall2_C.description: Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_Cable_C.name: Cable
Desc_Cable_C.description: Used for crafting. Primarily used to build power lines.

Desc_CandyCane_C.name: Candy Cane
Desc_CandyCane_C.description: A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. *Disclaimer: Can't be consumed....

Desc_GoldIngot_C.name: Caterium Ingot
Desc_GoldIngot_C.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_CircuitBoard_C.name: Circuit Board
Desc_CircuitBoard_C.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

Desc_Coal_C.name: Coal
Desc_Coal_C.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

Desc_ColorCartridge_C.name: Color Cartridge
Desc_ColorCartridge_C.description: Ammo for the Color Gun. Necessary to change the color of factory buildings and vehicles.

Desc_CompactedCoal_C.name: Compacted Coal
Desc_CompactedCoal_C.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

Desc_Computer_C.name: Computer
Desc_Computer_C.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

Desc_Cement_C.name: Concrete
Desc_Cement_C.description: Used for building. Good for stable foundations.

Desc_XmasBall3_C.name: Copper FICSMAS Ornament
Desc_XmasBall3_C.description: Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_CopperIngot_C.name: Copper Ingot
Desc_CopperIngot_C.description: Used for crafting. Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_CopperSheet_C.name: Copper Sheet
Desc_CopperSheet_C.description: Used for crafting. Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

Desc_LiquidOil_C.name: Crude Oil
Desc_LiquidOil_C.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.name: Crystal Oscillator
Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.description: Control Rods regulate power expenditure via electromagnetism.

Desc_FluidCanister_C.name: Empty Canister
Desc_FluidCanister_C.description: Used to package fluids for transportation. Can be recycled.

Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.name: Encased Industrial Beam
Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.description: Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously. Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

Desc_UraniumCell_C.name: Encased Uranium Cell
Desc_UraniumCell_C.description: Uranium Cells are concrete encased uranium pellets. Primarily used to make Nuclear Fuel Rods. Moderately radioactive.

Desc_XmasBow_C.name: FICSMAS Bow
Desc_XmasBow_C.description: A fancy Bow, maybe someone can wear this? You certainly can't! Can probably also make some parts and decoratoins from this.

Desc_XmasWreath_C.name: FICSMAS Decoration
Desc_XmasWreath_C.description: A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.

Desc_XmasBallCluster_C.name: FICSMAS Ornament Bundle
Desc_XmasBallCluster_C.description: All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more Ficsmas Decorations!

Desc_XmasBranch_C.name: FICSMAS Tree Branch
Desc_XmasBranch_C.description: A special Tree Branch, used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.

Desc_XmasStar_C.name: FICSMAS Wonder Star
Desc_XmasStar_C.description: This special FICSMAS Star signifies the productivity of FICSIT all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Events, so time to get back to work.

Desc_Fabric_C.name: Fabric
Desc_Fabric_C.description: Used for equipment crafting. Flexible but durable fabric.

Desc_LiquidFuel_C.name: Fuel
Desc_LiquidFuel_C.description: Fuel is either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_Filter_C.name: Gas Filter
Desc_Filter_C.description: Used in gas masks to filter out pollutants in the air.

Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.name: Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.name: High-Speed Connector
Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

Desc_HazmatFilter_C.name: Iodine Infused Filter
Desc_HazmatFilter_C.description: Used in hazmat suits to filter out radioactive particles in the air.

Desc_XmasBall4_C.name: Iron FICSMAS Ornament
Desc_XmasBall4_C.description: This super special... nope... still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_IronIngot_C.name: Iron Ingot
Desc_IronIngot_C.description: Used for crafting. Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_IronPlate_C.name: Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlate_C.description: Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.

Desc_IronRod_C.name: Iron Rod
Desc_IronRod_C.description: Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.

Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.name: Liquid Biofuel
Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.description: Fuel. The most energy efficient form of biomass.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.name: Modular Engine
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.description: Project Part #4. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_ModularFrame_C.name: Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrame_C.description: Used for crafting. Multi-purpose building block.

Desc_Motor_C.name: Motor
Desc_Motor_C.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.name: Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.description: Can be used with the Nobelisk Detonator to blow up cracked boulders, vegetation or other vulnerable targets.

Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.name: Nuclear Fuel Rod
Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.description: Nuclear Fuel Rods are used as fuel in nuclear reactors. VERY RADIOACTIVE.

Desc_Fuel_C.name: Packaged Fuel
Desc_Fuel_C.description: Fuel. Packaged Fuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.description: Fuel. Packaged Liquid Biofuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_PackagedOil_C.name: Packaged Oil
Desc_PackagedOil_C.description: Crude Oil, packaged for transportation or to be used as vehicle fuel.

Desc_TurboFuel_C.name: Packaged Turbofuel
Desc_TurboFuel_C.description: Packaged Turbofuel, a more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in vehicles.

Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.name: Petroleum Coke
Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.description: Used for crafting. A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

Desc_Plastic_C.name: Plastic
Desc_Plastic_C.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Desc_PolymerResin_C.name: Polymer Resin
Desc_PolymerResin_C.description: Used for crafting. A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

Desc_CrystalShard_C.name: Power Shard
Desc_CrystalShard_C.description: Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. It radiates a strange power.

Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.name: Quartz Crystal
Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.description: Used for radar and quantum technology.

Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.name: Quickwire
Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.description: Used for crafting. A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Desc_Rotor_C.name: Rotor
Desc_Rotor_C.description: Used for crafting. The moving parts of a motor.

Desc_Rubber_C.name: Rubber
Desc_Rubber_C.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

Desc_IronScrew_C.name: Screw
Desc_IronScrew_C.description: Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Silica_C.name: Silica
Desc_Silica_C.description: Derived from quartz, commonly used in structural materials and microelectronics.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.name: Smart Plating
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.description: Project Part #1. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_Biofuel_C.name: Solid Biofuel
Desc_Biofuel_C.description: Fuel. The most energy efficient form of solid biomass.

Desc_Stator_C.name: Stator
Desc_Stator_C.description: The static parts of a motor.

Desc_SteelPlate_C.name: Steel Beam
Desc_SteelPlate_C.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_SteelIngot_C.name: Steel Ingot
Desc_SteelIngot_C.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

Desc_SteelPipe_C.name: Steel Pipe
Desc_SteelPipe_C.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.name: Sulfuric Acid
Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.description: A liquid mostly used to extract elements from ore.

Desc_ComputerSuper_C.name: Supercomputer
Desc_ComputerSuper_C.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

Desc_MotorLightweight_C.name: Turbo Motor
Desc_MotorLightweight_C.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.name: Turbofuel
Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in Fuel Generators.

Desc_UraniumPellet_C.name: Uranium Pellet
Desc_UraniumPellet_C.description: Produced in the Refinery, Uranium Pellets are purified and cast from Uranium Ore. Primarily used to make Uranium Cells. Moderately radioactive.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.name: Versatile Framework
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.description: Project Part #2. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_Wire_C.name: Wire
Desc_Wire_C.description: Used for crafting. One of the most basic parts.
